messages.message: Do we have any environments which are still running on April release? JPMC are using metrics app as a proxy for CDU’s until Licence Manager can be deployed. What we are seeing is that the metrics app is not 100% accurate, so I wanted to test on an environment where I can run some flows and use my mapping to CDU’s to check

NatWest have never been able to get the metrics app to work either. The figures generally are not accurate and you cannot select the filters correctly to chose the correct org space. NatWest on July may have been fixed since
@Ben the aggregation systems are typically not perfect to the last digit.  They will have a minor percentage of error.  How off do you think we are here?
@sudeep can you please help @Ben and @Aimé to help out with the numbers?
I have seen these numbers at BofA where they have been fairly representative of what they have been running even at 10M+ aggregation.
The biggest problem we faced is that the filters don’t work properly :disappointed: They only list a small subset of what is actually available under flow path, org, repo and users
Those flowpaths are not even in the cdd org or ILE repo but they are the only ones we can select
Got it.  The filters do operate in a weird capacity.  Let me think about this a bit to see why it might be happening.  We might also want to do a quick zoom chat to see what might be going on.
coool Thanks @shaunak - I have sort of parked this right now given all the other things going on. Not a HUGE blocker for NatWest just now, but will need to be sorted at some point :smile:
yes, sounds good :smile:
I’ll not distract away from what is most important right now.

I should say this is important for me right now :smile: but we only have 3 flow paths in production, what we are seeing for 2 of those flow paths accurate numbers but for one, we are seeing 1000+ pages run, when we check with the team they have run <20 documents, at 5 pages each. So we are over reporting massively

Hey @Ben @Aimé - i would be happy to take a look into this together. For now lets start with the over counting that Ben is seeing. 

Ben - can you send us details of how this can be reproduced over a ticket or just a note on <#C01DJ7QDC2H|> ?

Aime - can you also arrange sometime to get on zoom call as Shaunak mentioned to look into this. Let me know when you'd like to discuss. Please note we are in an offsite - so thursday onwards this week would be helpful :)
not a priority this week but yes will schedule some time
also we can do Thursday as well, i’ll set some time up, to explain how we are doing it to make sure there are no issues :slightly_smiling_face:
Thank you so much cc @shikhar as well who has been focussing on these components

Hey thanks for the heads up!

For the flow list aggregation and filters not stacking up properly, we had a some conclusions in this thread

https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C011FHLBN8N/p1634152383401500?thread_ts=1633365360.340300&cid=C011FHLBN8N (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C011FHLBN8N/p1634152383401500?thread_ts=1633365360.340300&cid=C011FHLBN8N)
We do have a 21.4.0 sandbox up for testing. If you look for a page named Instabase Environments in confluence, you’ll see the url for all our sandbox env’s.
Thank you @shikhar for the details here — these make sense to me
@sudeep / @shikhar are you both IST? If so what time do you start? Conscious you may work US friendly hours so don’t want to set something up too early for you? Would 10am GMT work?
@Ben - yes we are both in IST - this week we have limited availability due to offsite going on. 10 am GMT sounds good to me
